item.name: Presence & WebSocket (5 endpoints)
item.description: Real-time presence tracking and WebSocket connection. WebSocket endpoint: ws://localhost:3000/ws?token={accessToken}

request.description: Get current user's online status. Requires authentication.
Get specific user's online status. Requires authentication.
Get online status for multiple users at once. Requires authentication.
Get list of all currently online users. Requires authentication.
Get WebSocket connection statistics (total connections, unique users). Requires authentication.

WebSocket endpoint for real-time features. Connect with token in query param. After connecting, send heartbeat messages: {"type":"heartbeat","payload":{}}. You'll receive: connected, heartbeat, user:online, user:offline messages.

item.name: Chat System (9 endpoints)
item.description: Real-time chat system with direct and group chats, messaging, typing indicators, and read receipts.

request.description: Create a 1-on-1 direct chat with another user. Returns existing chat if already exists.
Create group chat. TOUR_AGENT role required. Max 100 participants.
Get user's chat inbox with last message and unread count.
Get chat details with participants. Must be a participant.
Send message to chat. Can mention other participants.
Get messages for a chat with pagination. Use 'before' for infinite scroll.
Mark messages as read. Optionally specify messageId to mark all messages up to that point.
Add participant to group chat. Only chat creator can add. Max 100 participants.
Leave a chat. If last participant leaves, chat is deleted.

query.description: Filter by type: CHAT_MESSAGE, CHAT_MENTION, INQUIRY_RECEIVED, BOOKING_REQUEST, PROFILE_VERIFIED, SYSTEM

request.description: Get paginated notifications for authenticated user. Supports filtering by isRead and type.
Get count of unread notifications for the authenticated user. Use this for notification badge.
Mark a single notification as read. Replace {{notificationId}} with actual notification ID.
Mark all notifications as read. Optionally provide notificationIds array to mark only specific ones. If notificationIds is omitted or empty, marks ALL unread notifications as read.
Delete a notification. Replace {{notificationId}} with actual notification ID.
Create a new inquiry. Target types: TOUR, GUIDE, DRIVER, COMPANY. Can send to multiple recipients (max 10). If >2 recipients, requiresPayment will be true.
Create inquiry to multiple recipients. If >2 recipients, requiresPayment=true (payment logic TBD).
Get inquiries sent by current user. Filter by status (PENDING, RESPONDED, ACCEPTED, DECLINED, EXPIRED) or targetType (TOUR, GUIDE, DRIVER, COMPANY).
Get inquiries received by current user (as guide/driver/company). Filter by status.
Get inquiry details. Only sender or recipients can view.
Respond to an inquiry. Status options: RESPONDED (just replied), ACCEPTED (accepted the inquiry), DECLINED (declined the inquiry). Only recipients can respond.
Main search endpoint. Returns aggregated results for tours, guides, drivers, and companies. Use locationId for location-based search (main page use case). Combine with filters for advanced search.
Search only tours with price filter and sorting.
Search only verified and available guides in a location.
Text search across all categories - searches titles, descriptions, names, bios, etc.
Autocomplete for location search input. Returns matching locations by name or region.
Get aggregated counts for a location (tours, guides, drivers). Useful for location preview cards.
Create a review for a tour, guide, driver, or company. Requires email verification. One review per user per target.
Get reviews for any target (tour, guide, driver, company). Public endpoint - no auth required.
Get review statistics: average rating, total count, and rating distribution (1-5 stars breakdown).
Get authenticated user's reviews. Requires authentication.
Check if authenticated user has already reviewed this target. Returns hasReviewed boolean and existing review if any.
Update your own review. Can update rating and/or comment.
Delete your own review. Average rating will be recalculated.
Get complete API documentation including all endpoints, features, and WebSocket events.
Basic health check for load balancers. Returns 200 if server is running.
Comprehensive health check including database, Redis, and WebSocket status. Returns 503 if any dependency is unhealthy.
Get server metrics including uptime, memory usage, and WebSocket connection counts.
Kubernetes-style readiness probe. Returns 200 if database and Redis are connected.
Kubernetes-style liveness probe. Always returns 200 if server is responding.
Get all media files for a specific entity. Public endpoint.
Upload a single file for any entity. entityType options: tour, company, guide, driver, user.
Upload an image specifically for a tour.
Upload a logo for a company.
Upload a profile photo for a guide.
Upload a profile photo for a driver.
Upload an avatar for a user.
Upload multiple files at once. Use key 'files' for each file.
Delete a media file by ID.
